summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Economic Development Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on May 6, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Chambers and via videoconference. The meeting aims to discuss various economic development initiatives, budget briefings, and upcoming projects.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the March 26, 2024, joint meeting and the April 1, 2024, Economic Development Committee meeting.
2. Briefings on the FY 24-25 budget for Convention & Event Services and Planning & Urban Design.
3. Discussion on the Media Production Development Zone for South Side Studios Dallas, LLC.
4. Review of Development Services' monthly technology and metrics.
5. Presentation on a partnership with the Small Business Administration for the Small Business Center.

**Important Details**:  
- The committee will discuss the upcoming agenda item regarding proposed amendments to the Shops at RedBird Project Development Agreement.
- Presentations will be made by various directors, including Rosa Fleming and Andrea Gilles, on budgetary matters and development initiatives.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the meeting minutes and will review the proposed amendments for the Shops at RedBird Project. Additionally, decisions may be made regarding the budget allocations for the upcoming fiscal year and the partnership with the Small Business Administration. 

The meeting will also include an executive session if necessary, to discuss sensitive matters such as legal advice and economic negotiations.
